constituent: loneliness, house, uncle, above, small, little, crotch
koohiiStory1: The unmarried uncle´s house is the picture of lonlieness.
koohiiStory2: Four straight kanji here with 叔 in it, so let´s make one story: Your UNCLE was full of loneliness (#720) (寂), and he lived by himself. He was naturally graceful (#721) (淑) in the water, and you knew he was once on the Olympic synchronized swimming team. You knew that there was something different about him, but you joined his youth team and he watched over you carefully as coach (#719) (督). It was uncomfortable, though, how your uncle (#718) often touched you just a little above the crotch (叔) when coaching...
kunYomi: さび、さび.しい、さび.れる、さみ.しい
myStory: cô đơn. bác dưới mái nhà cô đơn
readingExamples: 寂滅 (じゃくめつ), 静寂 (せいじゃく), 閑寂 (かんじゃく), 寂 (さび), 寂しい (さび.しい), 寂れる (さび.れる)
